SEARCH
Package com.github.hypfvieh.java.rtcompiler.resources.locator

Klasse FileResourceLocator

java.lang.Object
com.github.hypfvieh.java.rtcompiler.resources.locator.AbstractResourceLocator
com.github.hypfvieh.java.rtcompiler.resources.locator.FileResourceLocator
public class FileResourceLocator extends AbstractResourceLocator
A resource locator used for regular files.

This resource locator is capable of recursively traverse directories when the locate(String, boolean) method is used.
Seit:
1.0.0 - 2024-01-26
Autor:
hypfvieh

  • Methodendetails

    • locate

      public List<AbstractResource> locate(String _filterPrefix, boolean _recursive) throws IOException
      Beschreibung aus Klasse kopiert: AbstractResourceLocator
      Locate all resources using the given parameter.
      Where and how the resources are located are implementation detail.
      Angegeben von:
      locate in Klasse AbstractResourceLocator
      Parameter:
      _filterPrefix - filter for e.g. file names or pathes
      _recursive - list everything recursively
      Gibt zurück:
      List, maybe empty - never null
      Löst aus:
      IOException - when locating resource fails

      public AbstractResource getResource(String _resourceName)
      Beschreibung aus Klasse kopiert: AbstractResourceLocator
      Retrieve a resource by name.
      Angegeben von:
      getResource in Klasse AbstractResourceLocator
      Parameter:
      _resourceName - name of resource
      Gibt zurück:
      resource or null
